author: kezriak
text:
Basically, most bottlenecks are CPU bound or bad coding on the devs side of things if your rig is decent, that or move the game to a SSD.

GPU bottlenecks are easy to work around even if you do have FPS drops, turn down shadow resolution to medium and ambient occlusion to low/off and turn down volumetric fog and your FPS just skyrocketed.
